features.title: Feature List
basic.storageManagement.value: Unlimited Batch Upload, Large File Support
basic.aiCapabilities.value: AI Auto Parsing, AI Auto Tagging, AI Smart Renaming, Smart Search, Search Similar Images
basic.assetOrganization.value: 70+ Format Online Preview, Flexible Tagging System, Folder Auto-Tagging, Asset Rating System, Color-Based Filtering, Duplicate Detection, Bulk Rename, Bulk Operations, Folder Access
basic.sharingAndCollaboration.value: Flexible Asset Sharing, Time-Based Access Control, Permission Management, Secure Sharing, Comprehensive Sharing Dashboard
basic.analyticsAndMonitoring.value: Activity Logging, Asset Performance Analytics, User Behavior Insights
advanced.advancedFeatures.value: AskMuse, Version Control, Collaborative Annotations, Multi-Level Permissions, Department Management, Enterprise Security, System-Wide Controls, Ownership Management
advanced.customSystemHomepage.value: Theme Configuration, Personalized Configuration, Navigation Layout, Website Links, Recommended Sections, Content Display Panels, Background Settings
advanced.standardProjectHub.value: Efficient Project Management, Visual Project Control, Multi-dimensional View Modes, Member & Permission Management, Team Collaboration Features
advanced.advancedProjectHub.value: Complete Feature Set, Multi-stage Project Control, Automated Workflow Engine, Comprehensive Template Library, Deliverable Validation System, Visual Readiness Management, Workflow Template Library
advanced.complianceCheck.value: Content Safety Detection, Violence and Sensitive Content Detection, Restricted Terminology Detection, Enterprise Custom Word Filtering
advanced.customMetadataFields.value: Custom Field Configuration, Multiple Field Types, Field Capacity
advanced.watermark.value: Site-wide Watermark System, Custom Watermark Content, Universal Display
